name: Cinnamon Toast Atrocities
description:
The official Cinnamon Toast Atrocities game!

Play at home or on the go. You play as a cinnamon toast square delivering confidential messages from South to North Korea in an attempt to spark diplomacy between the two nations. 

  • "Highly immersive!" - IGN
  • "Great atmosphere!" - Metacritic
  • "Interesting Story" - My Mother
  • "Why would you do this?" - Mrs. Gallagher
